articles.author: Joe Crann
articles.title: 'No disrespect…' - Burton Albion assistant makes big Sheffield Wednesday claim - The Star
articles.description: Burton Albion’s assistant manager, Dino Maamria, says that Sheffield Wednesday are a Championship team playing in League One this season.
articles.content: Maamria, who was speaking ahead of the Brewers visit to Hillsborough on Tuesday night, knows his side will have it tough against the resurgent Owls, admitting that theyll have to be on top their game… [+1154 chars]

articles.title: Cardiff City hit by illness outbreak ahead of Derby County clash - Derbyshire Live
articles.description: Bluebirds boss Steve Morison was left proud of his depleted side following Saturday's narrow defeat to leaders Fulham
articles.content:
Cardiff Citys squad has been stretched by a sickness bug ahead of Derby Countys visit to south Wales.

articles.title: West Ham star Andriy Yarmolenko 'donates £75,000 to Ukraine's Armed Forces' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Yarmolenko is his country's third most-capped player of all-time and appears to have dipped deep into his pocket to support the army in their fight against Russia.

West Ham's Ukrainian striker Andriy Yarmolenko has reportedly made a huge £75,000 donation to his country's Armed Forces in the wake of Russia's invasion.

articles.title: Barcelona 4-0 Athletic Bilbao: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scores fifth goal since Arsenal move - Daily Mail
articles.description: Athletic had the third-meanest defence in La Liga but they were beaten by Aubameyang on 37 minutes after he connected with a loose ball in the area after Gerard Pique's header.
articles.content:
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored again as Barcelona went goal crazy for the third game running, thrashing Athletic Bilbao 4-0 to go back to fourth in the table.
